verses.roman:
antaraṅga-pūrṇaiśvarya-pūrṇa tina dhāma
tinera adhīśvara--kṛṣṇa svayaṁ bhagavān

synonyms: antaraṅga—internal; pūrṇa-aiśvarya-pūrṇa—full of all opulences; tina dhāma—three abodes; tinera adhīśvara—the Lord of all three; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; svayam bhagavān—the Supreme Personality of Godhead.
translation: "These three places are full of internal potencies, and Kṛṣṇa, the Supreme Personality of Godhead, is their sole proprietor.
